placeholder.description: Text to display on server-side render (unless using 'placeholder' slot)
placeholder.description_zh: 在服务器端渲染时显示的文本（除非使用 'placeholder' 插槽）

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot is used to render content on client-side
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽用于在客户端渲染内容

slots.name: placeholder
slots.description: Slot used as placeholder on server-side render, which gets replaced by the default slot on client-side; overrides 'placeholder' prop
slots.description_zh: 在服务器端渲染中用作占位符的插槽，它被客户端的默认插槽替换;覆盖 'placeholder' 属性
